Welcome to proto_err's documentation!

Contents
===========

Proto_err is a python module for simulating sequencing errors in reads, aligning these reads to a reference and assessing the errors in the resulting samfile. 



.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   
   simulate.rst
   error.rst
   count.rst
